text: People’s Welfare Front has given Rs. 1 lakh as assistance to the family of a murdered Muslim autorickshaw driver from Ervadi. Khaja Maideen of Ervadi was murdered by an armed gang on December 21, which triggered tension in the region. While the police arrested six persons in connection with the murder, the State government gave Rs. 3 lakh as compensation to the family of Khaja Maideen.
title: Slain driver’s family gets assistance
